resources.string: Did you gain knowledge from this course?
Did the instructor make it clear what knowledge you were expected to acquire?
Did the questions ask on exams reflect the knowledge you were expected to acquire?
Did evaluations, other than exams (such as critiques, grading of papers, reports, or oral presentations) reflect the knowledge you were expected to acquire?
Did assigned readings contribute to what you learned in this course?
Did written assignments, not including exams, contribute to what you learned in this course?
Was the grading system clearly explained?
How many times was class canceled without substitution of some other learning experience, such as an assignment, film, field trip, or guest lecturer?
How would you grade the overall teaching effectiveness of this instructor?
Were the instructor\'s lectures well prepared?
Did the instructor seem interested in the subject matter of the course?
Was lecture material presented and explained clearly?
Did the instructor\'s lectures contribute to what you learned in this course?
Did the instructor\'s use of audiovisual techniques enhance your understanding of or interest in course material?
I did not attend class often enough to judge
I did not feel qualified to judge the instructor\'s teaching effectiveness
One of the worst instructors I\'ve had
One of the best instructors I\'ve had
Enter Your Major Code (See Code List)
Enter Your Total Number of Credits Earned\n(999 if you don\'t recall)
